definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Na 2:7 (on Is 44:28 cf; Che Di) palace, temple (v. also NH id. temple, Aram. [[הֵיכָלָא]], [[הֵיכְלָא]], haykal, palace, temple, Palm. [[הכלא]] temple Vog:16; cf. Ar. haykalun (prob. Aram. loan-wd. acc. to Frä:274), Eth. haykal: temple; As. ekallu, palace, temple;—prob. loan-wd. fr. Akk. e-gal, great house, cf. Schr:HI 148 COT 2Ki 20:18 Hpt:E-vowel 11 f. Lehmann:Šamaššumukîn 126, and on usage Dl:338; > fr. [[יכל]] ([[וכל]]) = [[כול]] contain Ew:§ 162 b Thes Add:84; cf. O1:§ 191 b Hoffm:AGG xxxvi. Mal 1889, 25 Dl:w; fr. an orig. [[יכל]] Lag:BN 121, but cf. Hom:ZMG 1890.547) abs. ´[[ה]] Am 8:3 + 27 t. (´[[הַה]] 1Ki 6:17 +); cstr. [[הֵיכַל]] Mic 1:2 + 35 t.; sf. [[הֵיכָלָָךָ]] Ps 48:10 + 2 t.; [[הֵיכָלוֹ]] Je 50:28 + 7 t.; pl. [[הֵיכָלוֹת]] Ho 8:14; cstr. [[הֵיכְלֵי]] Is 13:22 + 2 t.; sf. [[הֵיכְלֵיכֶם]] Joe 4:5; —never in Hex, rarely in S & pre-exil. prophets ; esp. freq. in Ki Ez & late proph., also Chr ; occasionally in Psalm ;—

rather seld. (royal) palace (so alm. always in As.); of Ahab 1Ki 21:1, of king of Babylon 2Ki 20:18 = Is 38:17, 2Ch 36:7, cf. Da 1:4, and pl. [[הֵיכְלֵי עׂנֶג]] Is 13:22 luxurious palaces; at Nineveh [[נׇמוֹג]] ´[[וְהַה]] Na 2:7; not clearly defined are [[הֵיכַל מֶלֶח]] Ps 45:16 and [[הֵיכְלֵי שֵׁן]] v:Ps 45:9; [[הֵיכָלוֹת]] Ho 8:14 (in N. Israel); vid. also [[וְהֵילִילוּ שִׁירוֹת הֵיכָל בַּיּוֹם הַהוּא]] Am 8:3 and palace-songs shall be howlings in that day; cf. also (prob.) of Phoenician palaces Joe 4:5; quite general [[הֵיכֲלֵי מֶלֶח]], Pr 30:28, & [[תַּבְנִית הֵיכָל]] Ps 144:12 (sim. of well-proportioned daughters);—usual term for royal palace in Heb. is [[בֵּית הַמֶּלֶח]], v. [[בית]].
of palace of God considered as king, = house of God or of ´[[י]], temple (cf. ´[[הַה]] Is 6:1

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: infr. where proph. sees [[אדני ישֵׁב עַל־כִּסֵּא]]):

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of early, pre-Solomonic house at Shiloh ´[[הֵיכַל י]] 1Sa 1:9, 1Sa 3:3 (= ´[[בֵּית י]] 1Sa 1:7, 1Sa 3:15; [[פֶּתַח אׂהֶל מוֹעֵד]] 1Sa 2:22 om. LXX We Klo Dr) with doors ([[דלתות]], 1Sa 3:15) & a doorpost ([[מזוזה]] 1Sa 1:9) (cf. 2Sa 22:7 = Ps 18:7

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of Solomon's temple: specif. the hall or nave of the temple (the holy place, distinguished from the [[דְּבִּיר]] the inner sanctuary, the Holy of Holies, and with this included in the more general term ´[[בֵּית י]] or [[הַבַּיִת]] , 1Ki 6:1, 1Ki 6:2 + oft.) 1Ki 6:17 (cf. v:1Ki 6:19, v:1Ki 6:20 & v:1Ki 6:2) also v:1Ki 6:5, v:1Ki 6:33, 1Ki 7:50 = 2Ch 4:22; further 2Ch 4:7, 2Ch 4:8, Ez Eze 8:16, Eze 8:16 [[הָאוּלָם עַל־פְּנֵי]] [[הֵיכַל הַבַּיִת]] 1Ki 6:3; [[אֻלָם הַהֵיכָל]] 1Ki 7:21 ‖ [[עַל־פְּנֵי]] [[הַהֵיכָל]] 2Ch 3:17; ´[[הֵיכַל י]] 2Ki 18:16; also in wide sense (appar. = ´[[בֵּית י]]), ´[[הֵיכַל י]] 2Ki 23:4, 2Ki 24:13 (‖´[[בֵּית י]]), Je 7:4, Je 7:4, Je 7:4 (‖´[[בֵּית י]] v:Je 7:2), Je 24:1 v. also [[נִקְמַת]] [[הֵיכָלוֹ]] Je 50:28, Je 51:11 (both ‖´[[נִקְמַת י]]); 2Ch 26:16, 2Ch 27:2, cf. 2Ch 29:16 (‖´[[פְּנִ֫ימָה בֵית י]]; opp. ´[[י]] ´[[חֲחַר ב]]), in all three ´[[הֵיכַל י]].

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: hall or nave of Ezek.'s temple, the holy place (v. supr.) (included in [[הַבַּיִת]], the general term embracing the whole group of buildings) Ez Eze 41:1, Eze 41:4, Eze 41:15, Eze 41:21, Eze 41:23, Eze 41:25 (cf. v:Eze 41:20) Eze 42:8.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: general designation of 2 nd temple, [[הַהֵיכָל]] Zec 8:9 (‖[[חְבָאוֹת]] ´[[בֵּית י]]); oftener ´[[הֵיכַל י]] Hag 2:15, Hag 2:18, Zec 6:12, Zec 6:13, Zec 6:14, Zec 6:15, Ezr 3:6, Ezr 3:10, [[הֵיכָלוֹ]] Mal 3:1, Ps 27:4; [[בּוֹנִים הֵיכָל ליהוה אֱלֽהֵי וִשְׂרָאֵל]] Ezr 4:1; [[הֵיכָל]]([[הַ]]) Ne 6:10, Ne 6:10 (‖[[בֵּית הָאֱלֽהִים]]), v:Ne 6:11; Is 44:28, cf. also Is 66:6.—[[הֵיכָל]] occurs occasionally in Psalm, without conclusive evidence, in all cases, to what temple ref. is had; appar. distinguished fr. ´[[בֵּית י]] (as sub

definitions.title: b
definitions.body: ) Ps 5:8 ([[הֵיכַל קָדְשְׁךָ]]; v. [[בֵּיתֶָךָ]] v:Ps 5:7); perhaps also Ps 68:30 (disting. from Holy of Holies by De Che; yet verse obscure) ; but no distinction evident Ps 79:1, Ps 138:2, Jon 2:5, Jon 2:8 (all [[הֵיכַל קָדְשְׁךָ]]); cf. [[קְדשׁ הֵיכָלָךָ]] Ps 65:5 (‖[[בֵּיתָָךָ]]); as containing the worshipping assembly Ps 48:10.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: of the heavenly temple where ´[[י]] sits enthroned Is 6:1; his abode in the heavens 2Sa 22:7 = Ps 18:7, Ps 11:4 (‖[[שָׁמַיִם]]; cf. [[זְבֻל קָדְשׁוֹ]] Is 63:15, ‖ id.), Is 29:9; [[אֲדׂנׇי מֵהֵיכַל קָדְשׁוֹ]] Mic 1:2, cf. Hb Hab 2:20 [[ויהוה בְּהֵיכַל קָדְשׁוֹ]].
